powergrid

Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • powergrid.Bot

  • public class Bot
extends java.lang.Object
    Bot-class representing the Player. The Bot can execute high-level tasks such as "travel to [destination]", "go to nearest [place of interest]", and others. It makes use of the Task subclasses in the powerwalk.tasks package to achieve these tasks.

    The Bot also provides top-level access to PowerWalk's functionality, and can be used either issue commands, or retrieve information about the Player's current state.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STATE_IDLE
      This State represents the state of the Bot when there are no Tasks.
      static int STATE_RESTING
      This State represents the state of the Bot while resting.
      static int STATE_UNKNOWN
      This State represents any state that is not recognized by PowerWalk.
      static int STATE_WALKING
      This State represents the state of the Bot while walking or running.

    • Method Detail

      • travelTo

        public static void travelTo(java.lang.String name,
            int priority)
        Registers a Task that moves to the destination specified in name.

        Parameters:
        name - The target destination (providing correct casing is faster, but not required)
        priority - The priority of this Task
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when no Destination exists with that name

      • travelTo

        public static void travelTo(Point p,
            int priority)
        Registers a Task that moves to the specified Point in the World

        Parameters:
        p - The Point to move to
        priority - The priority of this Task

      • rest

        public static void rest(int priority,
        boolean abortOnTask)
        Registers a RestTask instance that rests until the player's energy is at 100% again.
        Parameters:
        priority - the priority of this Task
        abortOnTask - whether this Task should be aborted when other Tasks are present.

      • getState

        public static int getState()
        Returns an integer specifying the current state of the Bot.

        This integer represents one of the following states:

        • Idle (represented by Bot.STATE_IDLE
        • Walking (represented by Bot.STATE_WALKING
        • Resting (represented by Bot.STATE_RESTING
        • Unknown (represented by Bot.STATE_UNKNOWN
        More states might be added in future releases.
        Returns:
        an integer specifying the current state of the Bot.

      • getPosition

        public static Point getPosition()
        returns the Player's current Position
        Returns:
        the Player's current Position

      • gotoNearest

        public static void gotoNearest(java.lang.String dest,
               int priority)
        registers a Task that moves to the nearest destination that matches the description in dest.

        Parameters:
        dest - The target destination
        priority - the priority of this Task
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - when no destinations for this destination type are registered
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the provided destination type is invalid
